sentences.en: Allen, don't you dare go anywhere else, you hear?
sentences.cn: 艾伦，其他地方哪儿都不准去，听到了吗？

sentences.en: Andrew went rigid when he saw a dog, any dog, anywhere.
sentences.cn: 安德鲁过去只要看见狗，无论在哪里，无论什么狗，都会吓得一动不动。

sentences.en: Did you try to get help from anywhere?
sentences.cn: 你尝试过从哪里寻求帮助吗？

sentences.en: Have you any valuables anywhere else in the house?
sentences.cn: 你房子里其他地方还有贵重物品吗？

sentences.en: He'll meet you anywhere you want.
sentences.cn: 他随你在哪儿见面都行。

sentences.en: His shoes cost anywhere from $200 up.
sentences.cn: 他买的鞋子总在200美元以上。

sentences.en: I don’t want to live in London, but I’d be happy living anywhere else .
sentences.cn: 我不想住在伦敦，但是住在其他什么地方我都很乐意。

sentences.en: I haven't got anywhere to live.
I was miles and miles from anywhere.
sentences.cn: 我离任何地方都非常远。

sentences.en: I wonder if Tom ever had his teeth fixed anywhere else.
sentences.cn: 我在想汤姆是不是在别的地方整过牙。

sentences.en: I wouldn't dream of letting a surgeon anywhere near my eyes.
sentences.cn: 我决不会让外科大夫靠近我的眼睛的。

sentences.en: Is there anywhere tolerable to eat in town?
sentences.cn: 城里有什么过得去的地方可以吃饭吗？

sentences.en: Rachel would have known Julia Stone anywhere.
sentences.cn: 甭管到哪儿，雷切尔都会认出朱莉娅·斯通。

sentences.en: She made a mental note not to sit anywhere near him.
sentences.cn: 她心里牢牢记着不坐在他的附近。

sentences.en: The only one who's anywhere close to the truth is my mother.
sentences.cn: 唯一算得上了解真相的人是我的母亲。

sentences.en: There weren't anywhere near enough empty boxes.
You can buy clothes like these anywhere.
sentences.cn: 这样的衣服到处都可以买到。

sentences.en: You can go anywhere and still the compass points north or south.
sentences.cn: 无论走到哪里，罗盘仍然指向北或南。

words.tran_cn: 无论如何，不管怎样；总之

phrases.tran_cn: 无处不在；任何地方都是如此
如果有什么地方的话，如果在哪儿能…的话
或是什么别的地方，或其他某地

trans.tran_cn: 任何地方，（用于强调）根本，一点儿，（用于疑问句和条件从句）哪里，（用于否定句）哪儿，到处
trans.tran_en: You use anywhere in statements with negative meaning to indicate that a place does not exist
